Detailed Description

Provides some useful functions which would be normally global. A class which contains static members to do small things.

Some methods,that would be normaly global, but I hate global functions :-) (the function locateHTML is from Sandy Meier (KDevelop))

Author(s):
Joachim Ansorg <jansorg@gmx.de>

QString CToolClass::encodeReference ( QString & module,
QString & reference ) [static]

Puts a module Name and a Reference together in the 'draggable' form (module)reference.

Parameters:
module   The name of the module
reference   The key reference as text
Returns:
The encoded reference using module and reference

QString CToolClass::locatehtml ( const QString & filename ) [static]

Returns:
The path of the HTML file "filename". This function searches only in $KDEDIR.

QString CToolClass::urlToKey ( const QString & ) [static]

Parses a unicode URL and gives back a SWORD key as QString.

For example it gets "Genesis201:1" and returns "Genesis 1:1".

Returns:
The key we got after parsing the URL
Author(s):
Joachim Ansorg
